Name: HIYOKU NO TORI
About the game: 'HIYOKU NO TORI' is a mystery adventure game with choices. FEATURES An occult mystery set in Kyoto, the ancient capital of Japan. Multi-ending story with seven different endings. Full voice support in two languages: Japanese and Chinese 'Tokyo Active NEETs' participated with background music. STORY One day, a woman, victim of a stalker, rushed into Kamotan. The detectives, including Tatsumi, considered accepting her request to track down the stalker, but she confessed that the stalking had finished and there was no more danger. The female client told them that she had visited a shrine famous for breaking connections with people and prayed for her wish to come true. After that, her stalker died. She was utterly upset by the thought that her wish caused his death. Is this what really happened? Kamotan members began their investigation to get to the bottom of the truth. CHARACTER Tatsumi Ohsato CV: Masaaki Mizunaka / Zhihao Qiao Former detective with Camotan. He has special abilities. He has a strong sense of justice and is serious and kind. Hyogo Ohtori CV: Sho Karino / Jax wang The head of the Kamoin Detective Agency, known for solving mysterious cases. He is a mentalist by nature. He has excellent observational skills. Kosaku Minobe CV: Yu Miyazaki / Zhi An He's well known in the underworld as a genius hacker. But for some reason, he is in Kamotan. Extremely shy. Renji Kujiki CV: Daisuke Hirakawa / Jin Yang He is an excellent communicator. He is always roaming the streets at night, but he cannot drink. STAFF ＜Character Design＞ Nitaka ＜Scenario＞ Yuzuko Asai ＜Sound Designer＞ Ryusei Akai (Tokyo Active NEETs) RYU (BLOOD STAIN CHILD)
